meanings.definition: A person who acts independently or irresponsibly.
meanings.sent1: The freewheelers in the office always come up with creative ideas.
meanings.sent2: The freewheelers at the park were playing music loudly.
meanings.sent3: The freewheelers decided to have a picnic in the middle of the workday.
meanings.sent4: She was a freewheeler, dancing through life without a care in the world.
meanings.sent5: The freewheelers painted the town red, spreading joy wherever they went.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who operate without constraints or rules.
meanings.sent1: The freewheelers gathered at the beach for a spontaneous party.
meanings.sent2: The freewheelers in the neighborhood organized a street cleanup.
meanings.sent3: The freewheelers decided to have a potluck dinner with no assigned dishes.
meanings.sent4: The freewheelers were like a flock of birds, moving in harmony without a leader.
meanings.sent5: The freewheelers navigated the city streets with ease, exploring every corner.
